description: John Doe has a passion for capturing the world on camera. You can reach him via email: john.doe@example.com. See the code

Sam Gregg Sam Gregg is a current Film Student, as well as a freelance photographer, video editor, and photojournalist. If you have any questions about my work, or would like to work together, please reach out to me via email: sam@quackcore.com.
